Write-Up Text: The Australian budget is the talk of the town for people everywhere. Social media enthusiasts share their opinions on the budget's first surplus in over a decade and what it might mean for a post-pandemic economy. The budget survey ranges from applauding it as proof of stable financial recovery to criticizing it for its distribution policies. Some hint this achievement should be a pro-women one while others are intrigued by how the surplus is expected to offset this year's deficit.
